column4: hello. i need some help please. I can't set the hour in ubuntu it says that i can't do that
it says: "the configuration could not be loaded"
i add my name to the sudoers file
you're trying to change the time, correct?
yes im trying to change it
you've tried right clicking on the time in the upper right of the screen, going to adjust time/date, and working from there?
yes i did that, but i get a message that i can't because im not allowed to use the system configuration
did it prompt for the root password?
try opening up a terminal and typing "sudo time-admin"
what can i do to do things like that wothout a password
perfect! doing things like that without a password...you won't be able to, since it's making a change to system settings
